mapper.update: UPDATE WORK SET WSTATE = 'ING' WHERE WCODE = #{wcode}
mapper.select: SELECT WCODE, WTITLE, WDATE, WEND, WSTATUS, ENO, DNO FROM WORK WHERE MANAGER_ENO = #{managerEno}
SELECT WCODE, WTITLE, WDATE, WEND, WSTATUS, ENO, DNO FROM WORK WHERE REQUESTER_ENO = #{requesterEno}
mapper.update: UPDATE WORK SET WTITLE = #{wtitle}, WEND = #{wend}, WSTATE = #{wstate}, WCONTENT = #{wcontent} WHERE WCODE = #{wcode}
mapper.select: SELECT R.WRNO, R.WCODE, R.ENO, R.WRCONTENT, R.WRREGDATE, E.ENAME AS WRITERNAME FROM WORKREPLY R JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON R.ENO = E.ENO WHERE R.WCODE = #{wcode} ORDER BY R.WRREGDATE DESC
SELECT R.WRNO, R.WCODE, R.ENO, R.WRCONTENT, R.WRREGDATE, E.ENAME AS WRITERNAME FROM WORKREPLY R JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON R.ENO = E.ENO WHERE R.WRNO = #{wrno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORKREPLY (WRNO, WCODE, ENO, WRCONTENT, WRREGDATE) VALUES (WORKREPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{wcode}, #{eno}, #{wrcontent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT W.WCODE, W.WTITLE, W.WDATE, W.WEND, W.WSTATUS, W.ENO, W.DNO, R.ENAME AS REQUESTERNAME, M.ENAME AS MANAGERNAME FROM WORK W LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE R ON W.REQUESTER_ENO = R.ENO LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE M ON W.MANAGER_ENO = M.ENO WHERE DNO = #{dno}
SELECT WM.WCODE, WM.ENO, E.ENAME FROM WORKMANAGER WM JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON WM.ENO = E.ENO WHERE WM.WCODE = #{wcode}
SELECT WCODE, WTITLE, WDATE, WEND, WSTATUS, ENO, DNO FROM WORK WHERE ENO = #{eno} AND WSTATUS = 'PENDING'
SELECT WCODE, WTITLE, WDATE, WEND, WSTATUS, ENO, DNO FROM WORK WHERE ENO = #{eno} AND WSTATUS = 'WAITING'
SELECT WCODE, WTITLE, WDATE, WEND, WSTATUS, ENO, DNO FROM WORK WHERE ENO = #{eno} AND WDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')+6
SELECT WCODE, WTITLE, WDATE, WEND, WSTATUS, ENO, DNO FROM WORK WHERE ENO = #{eno}
